body_html:
On windows, you can use either CMAKE or Bazel.
We use makefile primarily for iOS support.
@kakashidan It is possible some of the libraries you are trying to use are excluded in makefile build?
You can see this piece for details:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile#L418

Please see the README file in makefile folder for more details.

body:
On windows, you can use either CMAKE or Bazel.
We use makefile primarily for iOS support.
@kakashidan It is possible some of the libraries you are trying to use are excluded in makefile build?
You can see this piece for details:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile#L418

Please see the README file in makefile folder for more details.
